articles.title: Airtel share price surges after promoter Bharti Telecom acquires additional 1.35% stake | Mint - Mint
articles.description: Bharti Airtel soared to new high to  ₹1,022.55 per share on Friday, December 1, on NSE after its promoter company Bharti Airtel acquired an additional 1.35 percent stake in the telecom company.

articles.title: India-spec Renault Duster to come in 5 & 7-seat configurations - Team-BHP

articles.author: Kunal Manchanada
articles.title: Park+ revenue spikes 2.5X to Rs 100 Cr in FY23 - Entrackr
articles.description: Four-year-old Park+’s revenue from operations grew 2.5X to Rs 96 crore in FY23 from Rs 39 crore in FY22, docs filed with RoC shows.
